definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The ser- um could be separated into 8 layers by potassium bromide density gradient ultracentrifugation.
sentences.chinese: 經溴化鉀密度梯度超離心分離大鼠血清得到8層製品。

sentences.english: The reference 197K in a monograph signifies that the substance under examination is mixed intimately with potassium bromide.
sentences.chinese: 在專論中提到意味着該待檢物質與溴化鉀充分混合。
